desc-with-translation.zh: Infinite Scroll 允许用户滚动到指定位置时加载更多内容。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: Infinite Scroll allows users to load more content when they scroll to a specified location.

desc-with-translation.zh: 当距离底部的偏移为该值时，触发回调。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: When the offset from the bottom is this value, the callback is triggered.

desc-with-translation.zh: 需要提供 load 事件的回调，会给回调传递 load 参数，当获取数据后，需要调用 load 函数来关闭 loading 状态。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: You need to provide a callback for the load event, and pass the load parameter to the callback. After obtaining data, you need to call the load function to disable the loading state.
